items.sentence: I didn\'t have the heart to tell Tom about that.
I didn\'t remember how to get back to the hotel.
I don\'t have any recollection of what happened.
I like children. That\'s why I became a teacher.
Tom is doing better today than he was yesterday.
Tom is going to have to do that sooner or later.
Tom is in the habit of staying up late at night.
Listen carefully and do exactly what I tell you.
Nobody will be able to stop Tom from doing that.
On October 20, 2013, Tom married Mary in Boston.
